title: About
text:
Matt Crump is a cognitive psychologist at Brooklyn College of CUNY, and runs the computational cognition lab in the Department of Psychology.
He sometimes makes paintings, pictures, and other visual things.

title: About
text:
Education
Postdoc, Vanderbilt University - 2011 (Psychology)
Ph.D., McMaster University - 2007 (Psychology)
B.Sc., University of Lethbridge - 2002 (Psychology)

title: About
text:
Experience
Assistant Professor - Brooklyn College of CUNY (2011)
Associate Professor - Brooklyn College of CUNY (2016)
Full Professor - Brooklyn College of CUNY (2022)
